trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gir støtte for utforming i en visuelle utformeren for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: I en visuelle utformeren når brukeren bytter fra kilden til utformingsvisning, markup kildekode som beskriver en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>kontrollen analyseres og en utformingen versjon av kontrollen er opprettet på utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren bytter tilbake til visning i datakilden, er utformingen kontrollen beholdt i markup kildekode og redigeres i markup for websiden.

trans-unit.source: The HiddenFieldDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: Klassen HiddenFieldDesigner gir støtte for utforming for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>i en visuelle utformeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>metoden returnerer markup som brukes til å gjengi den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>under utformingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.Initialize%2A>Metoden Klargjør utformeren for å vise, redigere, og utformer tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework internt bygger en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner>klasse når det oppretter den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>kontroll eller en kopi av det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>kontrollen i utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Henter markup som brukes til å gjengi den tilknyttede kontrollen under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the control class name and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetDesignTimeHtml genererer koden for en plassholder som inkluderer klassenavnet kontrollen og <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the markup used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder markup brukes til å gjengi den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"> </xref> under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Forbereder utformeren for å vise, redigere og utforme den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The designer calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control.
trans-unit.target: Designer kaller i initialiseringsmetoden når den er klar til å bruke designer til å gjengi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseringen base metodene konfigurere egenskaper og koble til hendelser som er nødvendige for operasjonen av designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control.
trans-unit.target: Den `component` parameteren er av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>kontrollen som er tilknyttet utformeren eller en kopi av det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>
